posts.title: Amazon ruined "It's a Wonderful Life" with their abridged version.
posts.content: While trying to watch a classic with my wife, who has never seen it, I got completely taken back by Amazon's idea to take out the most important part of the movie. The took out the heartfelt part where the angel Clarence shows George what the world would be like without him being born. He realizes that his life has not been a waste because of all the people he's help through his life. Fuck Amazon.

posts.title: Those Damned Poison Shots and That Weasel Fauci
posts.content:
So, this year, I wasn't able to visit my aunt for Christmas due to unemployment. Normally, she would call me a couple of weeks before Christmas to finalize our plans, but she didn't this year. It was a little unusual, but she does follow me on Fakebook, so she could have figured I wasn't coming due to my current issues. I tried calling her on Christmas Day twice, but she never picked up. I texted her, and I finally got a response just now.

Apparently, she's been in the ICU since the 14th with "severe pneumonia and out-of-control heartbeat."

And before any of you ask...yes, she got Fauci's lethal injection. One time, she very loudly proclaimed that she was going to get every booster. What can I say? She took PMSNBC and Commie News Network as gospel.

That said, though, after my mother died, she became my go-to Christmas spot. For all her poor political choices, she is a damn good cook, and has always treated me like another son, most especially after my mother's passing. A couple of years ago, she gave me the best Christmas gift ever, a handwritten collection of our family's recipes.

She may not be in complete political alignment with us, but I assure you she is nowhere near evil, either. If anything, she was just easily scared into thinking that this lab-grown cold virus would kill us all. It's ironic that she decried my grandmother for watching FOX News 24/7 (back when they were better than they are now), and now here she is, doing the same thing but with the opposition...

At any rate, may I ask for some prayers for her?
posts.raw_content:
So, this year, I wasn't able to visit my aunt for Christmas due to unemployment.  Normally, she would call me a couple of weeks before Christmas to finalize our plans, but she didn't this year.  It was a little unusual, but she does follow me on Fakebook, so she could have figured I wasn't coming due to my current issues.  I tried calling her on Christmas Day twice, but she never picked up.  I texted her, and I finally got a response just now.

Apparently, she's been in the ICU since the 14th with "severe pneumonia and out-of-control heartbeat."

And before any of you ask...yes, she got Fauci's lethal injection.  One time, she very loudly proclaimed that she was going to get every booster.  What can I say?  She took PMSNBC and Commie News Network as gospel.

That said, though, after my mother died, she became my go-to Christmas spot.  For all her poor political choices, she is a damn good cook, and has always treated me like another son, most especially after my mother's passing.  A couple of years ago, she gave me the best Christmas gift ever, a handwritten collection of our family's recipes.

She may not be in complete political alignment with us, but I assure you she is nowhere near evil, either.  If anything, she was just easily scared into thinking that this lab-grown cold virus would kill us all.  It's ironic that she decried my grandmother for watching FOX News 24/7 (back when they were better than they are now), and now here she is, doing the same thing but with the opposition...

At any rate, may I ask for some prayers for her?

posts.author: mikethemarine

link_metadata.description: While Ukraine battles Russia’s ongoing invasion, the post-war future of the embattled nation is being reimagined in the Carpathian Mountains. OKKO Group recently began work on the GORO Mountain Resort, a $1.5 billion development set to rival Europe’s best alpine destinations. OKKO Group announced on its website that the company had started construction on October 23, 2024. Related: Year-Round Ski Resort […]
